Strings.Text: There is a jungle on the other \nside of the bridge. {pause}{clear}Behind the jungle there is a \nMissile Silo.{pause}
It's a gas energy tank of some \nsort. It is already empty.{pause}
A weathered cloth is covered on \nthe caster. {pause}{clear}Underneath the cloth are \nexperimental medicines.{pause}
It's an oversized ventilation \nsystem. A dinosaur probably the {pause}{clear}size of a T-Rex must have \nsmashed it.{pause}
You can see the main gate. {pause}{clear}The sign reads: \n“3rd Energy Research Facility”{pause}{clear}The jungle is too thick to get \nacross to the other side.{pause}
